item.title: Welcome Aboard: New Lally Student Cruise
item.description: RPI Lally School of Management welcomes new undergraduate and graduate students for an evening of community building, meeting faculty and staff, and peer networking. Please confirm attendance by Friday, August 22. Space may be limited; early responses are encouraged. RSVP here: https://forms.gle/fZa4U7CbSUnUtfeo7 Date: Tuesday, August 26, 2025 Time: 5:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m. (Boarding begins at 4:30 p.m.) Location: 177 Front Street, Troy, NY 12180 Dress Code: Business Casual Contact: mcphij@rpi.edu

item.title: Final Campus Cleanout Days of 2025
item.description: Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) and Environmental & Site Services (E&SS) are partnering with the campus community to encourage cleanouts of cluttered storage areas, offices, shops, and labs. Take advantage of these free events to prepare your spaces for the upcoming fall semester!

item.title: JEC walkway underpass roadway closure until 8/29/25
item.description: The project has come across an unexpected issue and will require adding additional shoring to be installed while structural repairs are being addressed on the underside of the bridge. This will result in the closure of the underpass under the bridge until 8/29/25. We are doing this now so that the underpass can be restrictively (closed during working hours, open nights weekends) and reopened before the Sage Ave. entrance closure on 9/8/25.
